column3: “Just got this today and am Paxing it as I write. The flavor is great. Very fruity and smooth on the inhale/exhale. It seems to be a perfect hybrid. Normally I like heavy couch lock indicas but I am enjoying it's upbeat yet sedative effect. Nausea, stomach issues have been eased away by this comforting strain. Good for outdoors as well.”

“Very Tasty and affective strain. 
Feel the affects within 3 hits;)”
“I thought I liked ak47 too much to go for blueberry ak, but I found this was perfect for focus while remaining relaxed. no anxiety. will get again in the future.”

“Potent but up lifting body buzz, same goes for head. Instant feeling followed by a back up creeper wave" that can be fairly lethargic in heavy doses. Though it's an excellent on-the-go day time strain.”"
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
“Amazing strain one of the best I've ever tried smells like hash every time it's first lit love it !!!!!!”

“This strain is ace, knocked me straight on my ass. It has quickly become one of my favorites because of its ability to get me zooted every time. I use it at the beach and at night for a chill time. I highly recommend this strain to anybody who loves a good couch lock and some Netflix with snacks.”
“Simply amazing . beautiful tight buds , the smell is overwhelming and it tastes sooooo good . 5 stars . 👌”
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
“It good”
“This one is so bomb. Even my mother loves it. It's chill, super relaxing, and doesn't gong-show your brain.  Easily function while being pleasantly pain free.”
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
“It's one of my favourites”

“This is my first time smoking weed, so my review might be a little off. This hybrid is relatively sedative, smoked about 0.4 gram and fell asleep about 40 mins after smoking it. Woke up feeling nauseous and groggy for the first 3 -5 hrs, drastically improve my sleep quality though. 

All in all, a good sleeping aid!”
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
“it real good”
“amazing strain overall really makes you feel super energetic and upbeat but still able to relax. overall great strain except to if you r trying to sleep it kept me up all night.”
“By far my favorite stain. Keeps you at a nice couchlock for a few hours. Def gets you that I'm floating" vibe. Really wish it was more popular bc i miss it.”"

“Very versatile strain. Well balanced. Can easily be used for an energetic day time high, or as a relaxing nightcap. If you smoke enough, you might get a little couch lock. Had me laughing quite a bit, just put me in an overall happy mood.”

“I love this strain, first I ever had and I still do it now. The taste is great, the smell is nice (although when trying to hide it from roommates it is a bit of a strong smell.) The high for me isn’t always amazing but the dreams I get from it is like heaven.”
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
“Sooo dope, smells and tastes like Blueberry Yum Yum, nice high that highlights both strains highlights, a tripendicular experience I had smoking this!!!”
